::Perndabot::

Perndabot nods and relaxes slightly, but still ready to fight.

"Allright. I suppose you need a base to stay at and a faction to
join?" he asks.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jen D." <jeniff@h...> wrote:
> Antagony jumped back when Perndabot landed near her. She aimed her
acid 
> launcher at him but didn't fire. Around the two bots, all the
animals 
> suddenly became quiet as if sensing the tension.
> 
> "I'm friendly." Antagony replied while eying Perndabot. He was
almost twice 
> her size, but she wasn't scared of him. Somehow, she knew that he
wouldn't 
> fire on her and would take her to his base. It was a talent she had,
telling 
> the future.
